column5: Mahendra Singh Dhoni (born 7 July 1981) is an Indian professional cricketer#Newline		 who was captain of the Indian national cricket team in limited-overs formats from 2007 to 2017#Newline		 and in Test cricket from 2008 to 2014.#Newline		 He is a right-handed wicket-keeper batsman.#Newline		 He led the team to three ICC titles (2007 ICC World Twenty20#Comma 2011 ICC Cricket World Cup and 2013 ICC Champions Trophy)

Dhoni is the first#Comma and so far only#Comma wicket-keeper to effect 150 stumping dismissals across the three forms of the game.#Newline		His current total of stumpings in internationals stands at 161
